about_the_game:
Simulation game that includes a collection of projects used to test Unity engine capabilities and bring gameplay concepts.

Demo showcase the Standard Assets Concept gameplay.

Features.

-Simulation based game projects.
-Different completion challenges for each project.
-Benchmark capabilities and quality control for different configurations.
-Cross platform version for Windows, Linux and Mac.
detailed_description:
Simulation game that includes a collection of projects used to test Unity engine capabilities and bring gameplay concepts.

Demo showcase the Standard Assets Concept gameplay.

Features.

-Simulation based game projects.
-Different completion challenges for each project.
-Benchmark capabilities and quality control for different configurations.
-Cross platform version for Windows, Linux and Mac.
name: Unity Testing Grounds Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 a 2.4 GHz o equivalente
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X800 / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Unity collection of projects used to test the engine capabilities and bring gameplay concepts.
